meta.desc: Inverts the color of individual windows so they are hue-preserved.
meta.desc_long:
Inverts the color of individual windows so they are hue-preserved.
Default shortcut is Super+I

I've tested it with both XOrg and Wayland on Gnome 3.38 and 40.
Wayland users will have to log out and log back in for the installation to complete.

Version 6 has higher contrast than version 4, which I think makes it more readable.
Let me know what you think in the comments!
